alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Dickinson; Gogebic; Houghton; Iron; Keweenaw; Marquette; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 7:17PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Iron, Keweenaw, northwestern Dickinson, southeastern Gogebic, northwestern Marquette, Houghton, Ontonagon and Baraga Counties through 815 PM EDT/715 PM CDT/... At 716 PM EDT/616 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over U.S. 141 between Covington and Amasa, or 22 miles north of Crystal Falls, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rainfall with the potential for flash flooding. Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Covington around 730 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Three Lakes, Alberta, L`anse and Skanee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Baraga; Dickinson; Gogebic; Houghton; Iron; Keweenaw; Marquette; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton
